title: Bug 12906[Editor Mgmt] If file is already opened in one editor, cannot open in another editor (should give error msg)
description: Bug 12906[Editor Mgmt] If file is already opened in one editor, cannot open in another editor (should give error msg)
OB: When a file is already opened in one editor, there is no error message displayed when trying to open the same file in another editor.
EB: However, there should be a warning or error message displayed when attempting to open a file that is already opened in another editor.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open a file in one editor. 
2. Try to open the same file in another editor. 
3. Check if there is a warning or error message displayed.
